FOUND IN: Some common genera within this family include Campanula (bellflowers), Lungwort (Pulmonaria), and Lobelia
Consumer (general term for one who devours, eats or consumes)
Tenant (a person who occupies land or premises by agreement, usually through paying rent)
Sheriff (In US regions with county-level sheriffs)
Polar Bear (notably large, can be seen as a 'support' in the sense of their role atop the food chain)
